content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to specific information regarding a particular institution. However, in general, institutions face various challenges or setbacks that can affect their market position, such as changes in customer preferences, technological advancements, increased competition, economic downturns, negative public perception, regulatory changes, and so on. Institutions can address these challenges through various strategies, such as initiating new product development, improving customer relations, optimizing operational efficiencies, expanding their market reach, investing in innovation and technology, adopting new business models, and so on. Successful institutions continually evaluate their weaknesses and strengths, as well as external environmental factors, and adapt their strategies to maintain their market position.
